title: Best of the Program | Guests: Paul Sperry & Blake Masters | 8/23/22
description:
Glenn reviews a speech by Holocaust survivor Vera Sharav warning how fast the Western world can fall into evil practices comparable to Nazi Germany, such as Canada's euthanasia laws. Author of "Infiltration" Paul Sperry joins to discuss his Twitter ban for discussing the link he believes exists between the FBI raid on former President Trump and Russiagate. Senate candidate Blake Masters joins to share his fight to flip an Arizona seat from Democrat to Republican. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Glenn reviews a speech by Holocaust survivor Vera Sharav warning how fast the Western world can fall into evil practices comparable to Nazi Germany, such as Canada's euthanasia laws. Author of "Infiltration" Paul Sperry joins to discuss his Twitter ban for discussing the link he believes exists between the FBI raid on former President Trump and Russiagate. Senate candidate Blake Masters joins to share his fight to flip an Arizona seat from Democrat to Republican.
